title: [5] Old World Scars
contents: My pops used to work for the government, before the Collapse.
He was part of security for that laboratory in the mountains.
Pops worked there for years, all the way until the bombs dropped.
I looked. I looked everywhere I could for him.
But I never did see him again.
He never did tell me what they were doing in there.
But every time I asked about it, his face would get paler.
Looking back, it seemed like whatever was in that lab was the only thing that ever scared him.
When I heard that some old government heads were looking for that lab, I jumped at the chance.
Had he been holding out there the whole time?
The possibility kept me going, even after those scavengers nabbed us.
If these "NARS" guys can find that lab, maybe he'd be there?
It wasn't the craziest thought I'd had in the last few years.
Of course, they did eventually find that lab.
I don't know if they found what they were looking for in there.
But I now know two things:
I'll never see my pops again.
I know what he was afraid of.
